headline: PPG Board of Directors approves dividend increase to 71 cents per share
summary: PITTSBURGH, July 17, 2025--PPG's Board of Directors approved a 3-cents-per-share increase in the dividend, declaring a regular quarterly dividend of 71 cents per share.

headline: Mizuho Affirms ‘Outperform; Rating on PPG Industries (PPG) on Organic Growth Prospects
summary: PPG Industries, Inc. (NYSE:PPG) is one of the best chemical stocks to buy, according to billionaires. On June 23, Mizuho reiterated an ‘Outperform’ rating on the stock and a $125 price target. The bullish stance is in response to the research firm’s meeting with the company’s CFO, Vince Morales, and Director of Investor Relations, Alex […]
